name: The Tongue-Cut Sparrow
description:
Based on a Japanese fable, The Tongue-Cut sparrow is a two level platformer in which the player must traverse a bamboo forest. In each level, the player takes on the role of first Satoru, a kind old man with a skill for herbalism, and his wife Hidemi, a grumpy old woman with a fukiya to help clear her path. 

Keyboard Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Spacebar to jump
  • Satoru: E to gather herb
  • Hidemi: Q to shoot fukiya, E to chop bamboo (after picking up the axe)

Made in collaboration with Cae (https://twitter.com/caeen_) for character/asset design, character art and animations, platform and background assets, and coding of character mechanics.

I worked on coding systems, level design, cinematics, sound design, and score.
